card.name: A Few Trusty Lads
card.text: Playable only on your starting company in lieu of a minor item. You may not reveal an avatar. The company may contain 2 Orc leaders. All unique Orc-leaders in the company gain 3 EI against Orcs and you may start the game at one of their home sites. During your end-of-turn phase you may bring 1 resource from your sideboard to your play deck. Discard this card if the company contains more than 2 unique leaders or a non-Orc leader. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: A Worthy Substitute
card.text: Playable on a Darkhaven [K]. While this card is in play, your characters at the site may transfer allies to other characters of the same or higher mind (or a Ringwraith or Ringwraith followers) as the controlling character.

card.name: Abduction
card.text: Playable during CvCC if your company has at least twice as many characters and allies (with prowess attribute) than opponent’s company. Instead of making the body check for 1 of opponent’s characters (or 2 Hobbits) place him “off to the side” with this card: character is considered “taken prisoner” with the company. This card can be stored along with the character at a Dark-haven [K], Dark-hold [D] or Shadow-hold [S]; the site becomes the character’s rescue site. As a rescue attack use your company (if at the site) or the duplicate of one of the site’s automatic-attacks (your choice). Discard this card if no character is associated with this card at any time.

card.name: Abhorred Ring
card.text: Spirit Ring. Playable only with a gold ring and after a test indicates a Spirit Ring. -2 to bearer’s mind (minimum of 1). Bearer may tap to discard a hazard permanent-event played on his company or on a character in his company. Bearer makes a CC. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Ancient Rite
card.text: Spirit-magic. Playable on a Ruins & Lairs [R] or Wose-hold, by a spirit-magic user or Wose character. The site gains an additional automatic-attack: Pûkel-creature — 2 strikes with 9 prowess (canceled against your companies). Unless he is a Ringwraith, your Wose or spirit-magic user makes a CC at -4.Discard if the site leaves active play.

card.name: Assassin
card.text: Men. 3 attacks (of 1 strike each) all against the same character. Attacker chooses defending character. 1 or 2 of these attacks may be canceled by tapping 1 character (not the defending character) in the defender’s company for each attack canceled.

attr.value: men. 3 attacks (of 1 strike each) all against the same character. attacker chooses defending character. 1 or 2 of these attacks may be canceled by tapping 1 character (not the defending character) in the defender’s company for each attack canceled.
Orcs — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against overt companies).
Orcs — each character faces a strike with 8 prowess
you may discard this card to cancel all attacks from Mordor in Arms against one of your companies.

card.name: Betrayer's Heart
card.text: Playable on a non-unique detainment attack by Dwarves, Elves, Dúnedains, or Men (including an agent attack). The attack proceeds as if it were a non-detainment attack. The attack is treated as a normal attack, not detainment. If the attack is defeated, the defending player receives full kill mp, regardless of the presence of an asterisk (*). Place this card with the defeated attack.

card.name: Black Ring of Arda
card.text: Unique. Spirit Ring. Playable with a gold ring and only after a test indicates a Spirit Ring. Gives bearer warrior, scout, ranger, sage, and diplomat skills. Bearer must make a CC each time this card untaps. tap: if bearer is already a warrior to remain untapped against any strike this turn. tap: if already a scout to cancel a strike directed against any character in the company. tap: if already a ranger during organization phase to allow his company to move an extra region. tap: if already a sage to allow a character in his company to use magic this turn. tap: if already a diplomat to give +4 to an influence check he makes.

card.name: Black Steed
card.text: Horse. Playable at a tapped or untapped Border-hold [B] in Mordor or its adjacent regions. Cannot be controlled by an overt character. If controlled by a Ringwraith, he is in black rider mode. tap: cancel a strike from a non-automatic attack against its bearer or itself. If each character in the company controls a horse ally, they may move 2 additional regions.

card.name: Bloodspike
card.text: Unique. Hoard Item. Weapon. May only be borne by a Troll. Warrior only: +2 prowess (+4 prowess to a maximum of 12 against Dúnedain and Men).

card.name: Bone Dragon
card.text: Magic. Shadow-magic. Undead. Playable only on a shadow-magic user at a tapped or untapped site where an at home Dragon manifestation has been defeated. Unless the shadow-magic user is a Ringwraith, he makes a CC at -4. Cannot be duplicated for an eliminated Dragon manifestation.

card.name: Bone-basher
card.text: Unique. Only playable at a site with an Orc automatic-attack. Weapon. Two-handed. Warrior only: +2 prowess (+4 if Doors of Night is in play) (to a maximum of 10); -2 to target’s body.

card.name: Caran-carach
card.text: Unique. Demon. Wolf. 1 strike. May also be played keyed to Southern Mirkwood. Any body check resulting from the attack is modified by +1 if the character is not bearing an armor or a shield. As a short-event, 1 Wolf hazard creature can be played keyed to a Border-hold [B].

card.name: Cham-en-Faroth
card.text: Unique. Mind Ring. Playable on The Grimburgoth at any site where rings are playable, or at Dol Guldur if a manifestation of Khâmul the Easterling is in play. +2 on bearer’s CC from magic cards. +2 prowess against ringbearers in CvCC. Place any defeated creature affected by a sorcery card played on the company with this ring. For every 2 creatures placed with this card all creature attacks against the company suffer a -1 modification to prowess and body.

card.name: Creating Their Domain
card.text: Playable on your Ringwraith. Your Ringwraith’s company may move with region movement to any site in the same region as his home site. Bade to Rule is not discarded when moving through this region. Additionally, if at his home site your Ringwraith may use any of his abilities as if at a Darkhaven [K].

card.name: Curse The Baggins!
card.text: Dark-player only. Playable if you have Stinker at Dol Guldur (or Barad-dûr if you are Sauron). Place this card and Stinker in your mp pile; Stinker is concidered stored at the site (as if an item). Each untap phase he must make a body check; if still in play afterwards you may remove Stinker from the game and take My Precious from your discard pile or play deck to your hand. If Stinker is not in play this card is worth 1 mp and your ring tests at Bag End are modified by +3.

card.name: Curse unto his Kin
card.text: Unique. Only playable by a Sauron player on a Man or Dúnadan character with a mind less than 8, if your free GI is greater than the character’s mind. Discard all corruption cards on bearer; no corruption cards may be played on him. +3 to his CC and +1 to body. Sauron player’s GI is modified by -3 but he may opt to give a +1 or -1 to any roll bearer makes (before the roll). This card can only be discarded if bearer is removed from play. When this card is discarded, remove it from the game. If bearer is discarded, this card is placed “off to the side” with the character: he may be brought into play as if in hand. Bearer cannot be discarded by any hazard event effect.

card.name: Dark Defenders
card.text: A Ringwraith follower at a Dark-haven [K] may tap to use his special ability as if he were your Ringwraith. Any Ringwraith follower tapping in this fashion requires 3 points of influence to control this turn (if no influence is available, you may not tap him in this fashion). Discard this card when your play deck is exhausted.

card.name: Dark Forges
card.text: Sage only during the site phase at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the sage and the site. Sage may not untap until Dark Forges is stored at a Darkhaven [K]. During your organization phase, you may tap a sage at a Darkhaven [K] and discard a stored Dark Forges to retrieve any minor or major battle-gear item from your discard pile. The item must be placed under the control of a character in the sage’s company.

card.name: Dark Riders
card.text: Playable on your Ringwraith at a Dark-haven [K], if your Ringwraith is in a mode. Discard all Ringwraith followers which are not in a mode. -10 to your GI (-5 if your are The Witch King). There are no limits on how many characters are in your Ringwraith’s company. Discard during any of your next organization phases if at a Dark-haven [K].

card.name: Dark Spires Rising
card.text: Unique. Necromancer specific. Playable during the site phase on Barad-dûr, if Foundations Remain is inverted. Tap a character with a mind greater than 5 at the site or discard this card. You may play Hold Rebuilt and Repaired at Barad-dûr and invert this card. If inverted, this card is worth 2 mp, all versions of Barad-dûr are now considered a Dark-hold [D] and cards normally storable at Barad-dûr may be stored there. All sites in Udûn, Gorgoroth and Nurn are restored to their normal site type. Replace The Necromacer for either Sauron or The Lidless Eye (which may be taken from sideboard).

card.name: Dark Study
card.text: Sauron specific. Magic. Shadow-magic. Playable during CvCC. Choose an opposing hero character with a mind less than 6; if he is eliminated by a body check resulting from this CvCC place him “off to the side” with this card instead (otherwise discard this card). During each of your following organization phases, make a roll; if the result is greater than 7, bring the character into play (tapped) with this card at Dol Guldur. He is now considered an Undead minion character under your control with -1 to prowess and -2 to body and requires 2 points of influence to control.

card.name: Dawnless Day
card.text: Unique. Sauron specific.This card does not untap. During your organization phase rotate this card 90° and Ringwraiths may discard a mode card that is in play to play a mode card from hand. At the end of the organization phase for each Ringwraith player, if his Ringwraith is untapped heal all his Ringwraith follwers or heal the Ringwraith or if Ringwraith is tapped, untap all tapped Ringwraith followers in his company. Remove card from the game if inverted.

card.name: Descendance
card.text: Trophy. Playable on the highest mind character (avatarif present) in a company after an attack from a non- detainment Maia creature, if all strikes have failed and the creature is still in play. May also be played on your avatar, if a strike against him from an opponent’s Wizard or Lord in CvCC has failed. Discard the Wizard/Lord if still in play; keep any stage cards in play and place any non-ally cards ‘off to the side.’ Opponent may play his avatar from discard pile next organization phase. This card yields trophy mp.

card.name: Do as I Say
card.text: Minion only. Playable on a leader at the samesite as your avatar (or any Dark-haven [K] ifyou are Sauron). Fallen Saruman may also play this card, if he has Bad Company in play. The leader’s EI is 0 and he may not have any followers. The character is not considered to be a leader while bearing this card. Discard this card if you play another copy of this card, or if bearer is at a Darkhaven [K].

card.name: Dorwinrim School of Diplomacy
card.text: Lore. Playable on a non-overt, non-avatar diplomat during the site phase at Riavod, if you have Men of Dorwinion in play. Tap the diplomat. Target diplomat may tap and discard any treasure from the company or Gifts as Given of Old from hand to cancel a Dúnadan, Dragon, Dwarf, Elf, Man, Orc or Slayer attack. Any treasure item may be discarded instead of the listed items for Token of Goodwill. Additionally, target diplomat need not tap to play Ruse or Ready to His Will.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Ear in the King's Court
card.text: Playable on a Dúnadan if opponent has Return of the King in play, or on a Dwarf if opponent has King under the Mountain or The Lord of Dwarrowdelf in play. You receive this card’s mp if your Dúnadan bearer is at the same site as a manifestation of Aragorn II, or your Dwarf bearer is at the same site as The Lord of Dwarrowdelf or The King under the Mountain Dwarf. Discard this card during your end-of-turn phase if target character is not at that same site. Additionally if Dúnadan bearer has Minas Tirith as his home site, all of opponent’s Dúnadan factions played at Minas Tirith are worth 2 less mp (to a minimum of 1).Cannot be duplicated on a given race for a given player.

card.name: Feagwath
card.text: Unique. Dark-player specific. Leader. Can use shadow-magic. +2 EI against Orcs and Undead. tap: cancel a non-unique Undead attack against his company.

card.name: Flaming Torch
card.text: tap: modify the prowess of an Animal, Spider or Awakened Plant attack by -2. Alternatively, a ranger bearer may tap this item to cancel a non-automatic Awakened Plant attack.

card.name: Forged Below
card.text: Sage only. Playable during the site phase at any Under-deeps Shadow-hold [S] or Under-deeps Dark-hold [D]. Tap the sage and place this card on a battle-gear item a character in the company bears. If the item is a weapon, it gives an extra +1 prowess; if a armor, shield or helmet, it gives an extra +1 body. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

card.name: Foundations Remain
card.text: Unique. Necromancer specific. You may start with this card in lieu of a minor item. When Hold Rebuilt and Repaired is played on Barad-dûr, it is never discarded or returned to the site deck and you may tapap 3 characters with at least 3 different skills during site phase at Barad-dûr to invert this card. If inverted, it is worth 2 mp and you may play unique resources at sites in Mordor.

card.name: Fruitless Victory
card.text: Playable on a hazard creature with a normal prowess of 12 or more and/or a body of 6 or more, that was defeated by your opponent this turn. Make a roll. If the result is greater than the creature’s mp plus 5, the hazard creature is removed from your opponent’s mp pile and is returned to your hand.

card.name: Goblin-miner
card.text: +1 prowess against Dwarves. Discard on a body check of 7. Costs no influence to control if controlled by an Orc or Troll leader bearing a Whip.

card.name: Gorfaur the Lame
card.text: Unique. Troll. 1 strike. May also be played keyed to Dol Guldur. May also be played following an Orc or Troll attack in a Shadow-land [s] or at a Shadow-hold [S].

card.name: Grimbúrz
card.text: Unique. Playable at Laek Goak; also playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in Wilderland by the bearer of Cham-en-Faroth. if the influence check is greater than 10.Standard Modifications: The Grimburgoth (+3), any faction playable at Dol Guldur (-2) tap: let a creature in opponent’s discard pile attack 1 of your companies, if that creature has already attacked the company this turn.

card.name: Growing Shadow
card.text: Sauron or War-lord only. Playable on a region card, if any of its adjacent Shadow-land [s] or Dark-domain [d] regions contains either your War-lord’s home site or a site where you have a unique faction in play. Target region is also considered a Shadow-land [s]. Discard this card if you do not have such faction in play, or if your War-lord is at a site more than 3 regions away from his home site.

card.name: Guldurim
card.text: Unique. Playable at Dol Guldur if the influence check is greater than 9. Influence as 0 once in play. Standard Modifications: Necromancer’s Body Guard (+2), Orcs of Dol Guldur (-2)

card.name: Hammer of the Under-world
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Two-handed. Playable at the Ancient Deep-hold by an Orc or Troll leader with a prowess of at least 6. +4 EI. +1 body. Warrior only: +1 prowess (to a maximum of 10). A stored Dark Forges may be placed with this item to “restore” it. Once restored, Hammer of the Under-world gives 5 mp, 5 CP and +5 prowess (to a maximum of 12.)

card.name: Hatred
card.text: Playable on a non-Ringwraith minion character. Choose a type: Dúnadan, Dwarf, Elf, Hobbit, Man, Orc or Troll. The character receives +1 prowess against the chosen type. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Helm of Madness
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Only playable by a Man or Dúnadan at Mount Gundabad. + 2 to body and + 2 EI. If bearer is a Man or Dúnadan:tap: assign a strike to bearer instead of to another character. Bearer’s company may initiate CvCC regardless of their alignment. tap: assign all strikes in CvCC.

card.name: Hirbrand
card.text: Unique. +3 EI against factions playable at his home sites. Healing cards affect all characters in his company.

card.name: Houses of Lamentation
card.text: Playable on a non-Under-deeps Dark-hold [D]. The site becomes a Darkhaven [K] for the purposes of healing. Discard when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck.

card.name: Hurog
card.text: Unique. Uruk-hai. Leader. Discard on a body check of 8. +1 prowess against Dwarves and Men. +2 EI against Orcs. tap: give +1 prowess to all Orc characters in his company if at or moving to a site in Wilderland.

card.name: Ill East Wind
card.text: Environment. Until end of turn Doors of Night is considered to be in play. Return any cards that can only be played if Doors of Night is not in play to their owner’s hand.

card.name: Instilled with Malice
card.text: Ritual. Playable by an overt sage or spirit-magic user only, during the site phase at a site where Information is playable. Tap sage, place this card on a non-unique minor or major weapon item in the same company and choose 1 of the following: Dúnadan, Dwarf, Elf or Man. The weapon gives +2 prowess against the chosen type. Sage makes a CC modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated on a given weapon.

card.name: Interrogation
card.text: Playable on a company during site phase, at a site where your opponent’s character is taken prisoner, or if any characters have been taken prisoner with (a character in) the company. Opponent must reveal his hand to you. Store this card at a Darkhaven [K] and name 2 cards; if opponent has these cards in his hand he must discard them. When this card is stored it is worth 2 mmp, and if opponent has any ring items in play, all your ring tests are modified by +2. If you have 10 P or more, or your opponent is not a Wizard, this card may also be played as a hero resource; it may be stored at one of your Havens [H] instead.

card.name: Leärdinoth
card.text: Unique. Can use spirit-magic. + 1 EI against factions and characters playable at his home sites.

card.name: Legions of the Dark Lord
card.text: As a permanent-event you may play this card into your mp pile, you receive this card’s mp when you have at least 5 Man, Dúnadan and/or Orc factions in play at sites in Mordor or its adjacent regions. Cannot be duplicated as a permanent-event. As short-event, if you have at least a Man, a Dúnadan and an Orc faction in play at a site in Mordor or its adjacent regions, removes all non-Dragon factions from your discard pile and shuffle them into your play deck.

card.name: Lomëlindë
card.text: Unique. Agent. Agent only: tap: attack a company during its movement/hazard phase with +1 strikes.

card.name: Lure of Magic
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-Ringwraith character who can use sorcery, spirit-magic or shadow-magic. Target character makes a CC each time a character in his company uses magic. During his organization phase, the character may tap to attempt to remove this card by making a roll. If the result is greater than 6, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Mace-master
card.text: Warrior-only. Playable on a Dwarf, Troll, Wose or The Witch- king, if bearing a flail, hammer or mace (e.g. Bone Basher). Before resolving a creature attack with equal or less strikes than the prowess bonus the flail, hammer or mace gives (may not be used against creatures where each character faces a strike), bearer may tap the item to face the creature as though he were a one-character company. If the creature is defeated, the attack against the company receives -2 prowess and -2 body and bearer makes a CC; if ineffectual the attack resolves normally; if the creature is succesfull bearer is wounded (no body check required). This card gives 2 CP to a minion bearer.

card.name: Marauding Band of Orcs
card.text: Playable on an Orc leader. Discard if leader leaves play or if at any time the company contains more than 1 non-Orc character. There is no maximum to the number of characters in this company. Orcs with a mind less than 3 in the company require no influence to control. There is no limit (the limit is 5 characters if you are a Balrog player) to the number of characters that may be played with this company on a given turn. Attacks against this company may not be cancelled.

card.name: Marching Companies
card.text: Sauron specific. Playable on a company. You may place a Tribal Banner with a leader in the company during the organization phase; each leader bearing a Tribal Banner may be in the company with other leaders. If the company faces an attack and the leader controls any followers, you may opt to have the leader and his followers face the attack as if they were a separate company.

card.name: Master Smith
card.text: Unique. Playable on an Elf sage with a mind greater than 5 at a Darkhaven [K] (or in your starting company in lieu of a minor item). When at a Darkhaven or Dark- hold [D] tap bearer and discard a Dark Forges from the company to play a non-unique lesser ring special item with a character in the company. tap: take an Ore card from discard pile into hand.Discard this card if there is character with a higher mind in his company outside a Darkhaven, or if you reveal an avatar.

card.name: Miruimor
card.text: Unique. Can use sorcery. +2 EI against Men and Orcs. May be in a company with Orcs and Undead characters.

card.name: Mockery
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on your Ringwraith at a Darkhaven [K]. Choose an unwounded non-Avatar hero warriorwhose current site lists the Darkhaven [K] your Ringwraith is at as the nearest Darkhaven [K]. Your Ringwraith and the character engage in CvCC during each of his following organization phases (as if single character companies); opponent’s character may cancel the combat by tapping. Discard this card if the above mentioned conditions are not met. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Orc Archer
card.text: Discard on a body check result of 7. tap: give 1 strike from an attack (or in CvCC) -1 to prowess and body. {red}: Balrog offical rules: Home Site changes to: Any non-Dark-hold Under-deeps site {green} DCE: If you are a Dragon-lord: change home site to: Any non-Under-deeps Ruins and Lairs.

card.name: Orc Battalion
card.text: Orcs. Before strikes are assigned, make a roll, adding the company size and subtracting 1 for each scout in the company. If the result is less than 7, the attack is canceled. Each character faces one strike with 8 prowess. The attack receives +3 prowess if keyed to a Dark-domain [d].

attr.value: orcs. before strikes are assigned, make a roll, adding the company size and subtracting 1 for each scout in the company. if the result is less than 7, the attack is canceled. each character faces one strike with 8 prowess. the attack receives +3 prowess if keyed to a dark-domain [d].

card.name: Orc Grunt
card.text: Discard on a body check result of 9. +1 prowess if there are at least 2 other Orcs in the same company. {red}: Balrog offical rules: Home Site changes to: Any non-Dark-hold Under-deeps site {green} DCE: If you are a Dragon-lord: change home site to: Any non-Under-deeps Ruins and Lairs.

card.name: Orc-cuirass
card.text: Unique. Armor. Orc only: +1 to prowess and +3 to body (to a maximum of 9). If borne by a leader, leader cannot be discarded by a body check and he receives +1 EI for every 2 Orc factions you have in play.

card.name: Orc-endurance
card.text: Playable on a company with an overt leader. May also be played on a starting company in lieu of a minor item. Whenever a minor item may be played, a character in the company bearing Orc-pouch may tap to play Orc-draughts or Orc-liquor from sideboard (without discarding Orc-pouch). Discard Orc-draughts or Orc-liquor from the company to give +2 to all rolls for Orcs in the company that are not body checks but use the body value to determine the result, or for Where There is a Whip.

card.name: Orc-pouch
card.text: Tap bearer and discard Orc-pouch to replace it with a minor item from your discard pile or sideboard; item must be a startable minor item. If bearer is Radbug, you may take two minor items (no Orc-pouch) instead. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Origins Revealed
card.text: Stolen Knowledge. Sage only at an untapped site where information is playable. Tap the sage and the site to place this card with a hero item in the same company. Target item is now worth full mp and gives twice as many CP. In addition, if the item is a battle-gear item, no longer ignore its text.

attr.value: (1st) Orcs — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (2nd)* Undead — 2 strikes with 8 prowess. * must only be faced if the company intends to play an item.

(1st) Orcs — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment against overt companies).(2nd)* Undead — 2 strikes with 8 prowess. * must only be faced if the company intends to play a resource that taps the site.
Factions are only playable at this site if Hold Rebuild and Repaired is played on the site. Any Man or Orc may tap to play a food minor item from sideboard or discard pile.

card.name: Phantom Devised by Wizardry
card.text: Shadow-magic. Choose an opponent’s non-avatar character at the same site as your shadow-magic user: character must make a CC modified by -5. If he fails, he splits from the company and is placed at a site in the same or adjacent region (ignore other effects). Unless he is a Ringwraith, your shadow-magic user makes a CC modified by -4.

card.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
card.text: Playable on a non-dark player’s company moving to Dol Guldur, Barad-dûr, Mount Doom, the Under-courts, or the Sulfur-deeps. The hazard limit against this company is increased by 1 for every Nazgûl permanent-event in play. All characters moving to or at the site have their prowess and body modified by -1. Additionally, all positive modifiers to corruption checks resulting from sources other than modifiers listed on the character’s card are canceled until the end of the turn.

attr.value: Men — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies).

card.name: Second in Command
card.text: Playable on a non-unique Orc leader. May also be played in your starting company in lieu of a minor item. The leader may be in the company with another leader of a higher mind and gains an additional home site: any Shadow-hold [S] Orc-hold. Discard this card if no leader with a higher mind is in his company.

card.name: Sharpen Up
card.text: Tap the bearer of a Saw-toothed Blade during the site phase at a Ruins & Lairs [R] and play this with the Saw-toothed Blade. Saw-toothed Blade receives +1 prowess (+3 against Elves and Maia). Cannot be duplicated on a given Saw-toothed Blade.

attr.value: Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if company includes a character with Strayhold as his home site).
Brigands may always be keyed to this site with +1 prowess and +1 strikes.
Tap an avatar or a diplomat at this site to take an Assassin or Thief fromyour discard pile to your hand (tap the site if untapped).

card.name: The Goblins Are upon You!
card.text: Playable on a company facing an attack, if it contains at least 2 Orc characters. All Orcs in the company receive +1 prowess (+2 against Dwarves) and -1 body against the attack. Cannot be duplicated on a given attack.

card.name: The Iron-pit
card.text: Playable during the site phase at any Under-deeps Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] if the company has played Legendary Stair this turn. The site loses all automatic-attacks. During the site phase, any character at this site may discard a Blasting Fire or Liquid Fire he bears to make one non-unique battle-gear major item playable until the end of turn (even if the site tapped). Discard this card when the site is discarded or returned to your location deck. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Mornarturi
card.text: Playable if you are Sauron, Akhôrahil, Adûnaphel, or the Witch-king if you have a Dúnadan faction in play. Your Dúnadan characters may form companies with Orcs, Trolls, Undead and Ringwraith characters. These Dúnadan characters must always be the highest mind character in the company, and the company may not include another leader.

card.name: The Necromancer
card.text: Manifestation of the Lidless Eye. Playable if your opponent is not a Ringwraith and if you have not revealed a Ringwraith. You are Sauron, not a Ringwraith. You may not play Ringwraith characters. +3 to your GI. You may bring a resource from sideboard to your play deck during your organization phase. Dol Guldur receives an additional automatic-attack against all other non-Ringwraith player’s companies: Maia — 1 strike with 21 prowess (cannot be canceled). You may not use the site card for Barad-dûr. All cards which must be stored at Barad-dûr must be stored at Dol Guldur instead. You may play agent characters as normal minion characters and all your agent characters require 1 less mind to control (to a minimum of 3). All your overt companies have their hazard limit increased by 1 to a minimum of 3. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Necromancer's Bodyguard
card.text: Unique. Playable at Dol Guldur if the influence check is greater than 9. Influence as 0 once in play. Standard Modifications: Guldurim (+2), Black Trolls (-2)

card.name: The Slow Torment of Years
card.text: Sauron specific. Playable on an opponent’s character normally worth 2 mp or more, that is placed “off to the side” and taken prisoner with the company. If character is at Barad-dûr during your site phase, make a body check and rotate this card 90°; all of opponent’s characters in play must make a CC modified by -1 for each time rotated. If character is eliminated, place this card in opponent’s mp pile. Discard this card if a character of the company is wounded during CvCC.

card.name: Their Horror Spreads before Them
card.text: Playable after your Ringwraith’s company has defeated an Elf, Man, Dwarf or Dúnadan creature attack; place the creature with this card. All further attacks of the same type as the defeated creature against this company have their prowess reduced by 1. Cannot be duplicated for a given creature type.

attr.value: Hidden site. Tap an Orc ranger when revealing this site. Undead creatures played to this site receive +2 prowess.
(1st) Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Troll — 1 strike with 9 prowess
Hidden site. Tap a Dunadan ranger with a home site in Gondor, when revealing this site. Undead creatures played to this site receive +2 prowess.
Contains a hoard. Pirates may alwaysbe keyed to this site with +1 prowess and +1 strikes (even straight from your discard pile).
Contains a hoard. Pirates may alwaysbe keyed to this site with +1 prowess and+1 strike (even straight from yourdiscard pile).

card.name: Tribute to Sauron
card.text: Sauron specific. Playable on a Border-hold [B] by an untapped diplomat in a covert company. Tap the diplomat. This site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. Cannot be duplicated on a given site or given turn. If a unique hero faction playable at the site is in play, you may place this card with the faction, which is then worth 1 less faction mp. A Wizard or Lord may tap during site phase at the site to discard this card from faction or site.

card.name: Trophy-belt
card.text: May only be borne by an Orc or Troll. Cannot be transfered unless bearer is eliminated. You may place any trophies the character bears with this item; trophies are still considered borne by the character. When bearer has more trophies than other characters in the company, he must always face the first strike of any attack that does not choose defending characters (regardless of his status). When this card has 3 mp worth of trophies, character becomes a leader (if not already) and this item may be stored at a site where you have a unique Orc or Troll faction in play for 2 mp.

card.name: Ukôg the Lame
card.text: Unique. Uruk-hai. Leader. Discard on a body check of 7 or 8. +2 prowess against Orcs. +1 EI against Orcs and Trolls. His company may normally move only 3 regions. tap: after defeating a strike in CvCC to give -2 body to opponent’s character.

card.name: Ulrac
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against characters and factions playable at Wain Easterling Camp.

card.name: Under His Domination
card.text: Playable on a character taken prisoner at a Dark-hold [D]. Make a roll and subtract the character’s mind: if the result plus the character’s CC is greater than 6, the character becomes a minion agent controlled by the hazard player until this card is discarded (it cannot be targeted by Marvels Told). Discard all other hazard permanent-events on the character. Cannot be duplicated on a given character. Discard if the character is eliminated. During the organization phase, a sage at the same site as the character (other than the character) may tap to attempt to remove this card. Make a roll; add 1 for each additional sage or diplomat in the company that taps in support: if the result plus the character’s mind is greater than 7, discard this card; the character joins the sage’s company and is controlled by the sage’s controlling player.

card.name: Valleys Have Ears
card.text: Playable on your Ringwraith. tTap your Ringwraith during the organization phase to look at a number of cards from the top of any play deck equal to double the number of factions you have in play at sites in his current region or regions adjacent to this. If your own play deck, you may choose and take one of these cards to hand; return the others to the top of the play deck in any order you choose.

card.name: Vampire
card.text: Demon. 1 strike. Flying. Playable against non-minion companies only. Cannot be canceled by scout or ranger cards. May also be played on a company that has already faced a non-detainment Nazgûl or Spawn attack.

card.name: Virsh
card.text: Unique. Scara-hai. Discard on a body check of 7 or 8.

card.name: We Are Fighting Uruk-hai!
card.text: Playable on a company containing an Uruk-hai facing an attack. All Uruk-hai in the company receive +2 prowess and -1 body against the attack. Cannot be duplicated against a given attack.

card.name: Weapons of Morgul
card.text: Unique. During your organization phase you may discard a magic card to take up to 3 of the following cards from play deck (reshuffle) or discard pile to your hand: Helm of Fear, Morgul-blade, The Fiery Blade, or your Ringwraith’s specific weapon. If you are Sauron you may search for any Ringwraith specific weapon.

card.name: Widuskapin Ritual
card.text: Playable on Woodmen-town. Discard 1 minor item to heal (from wounded to untapped) a non-overt, non-Ringwraith character at Woodmen-town. Alternatively, discard this card to heal (from wounded to untapped) a character anywhere whose home site is Woodmen-town. Discard this card when Woodmen-town is discarded or returned to the location deck.

card.name: Wolf-den
card.text: Playable on a Darkhaven [K], Dark-hold [D] or Shadow-hold [S] if you have a Wolf faction in play and an Orc faction in play at the site. Discard this card if you don’t have these factions in play. Once per organization phase you may search your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) and take a wolf ally to your hand. Additionally, your wolf allies at this site heal from wounded to untapped during your untap face. Discard this card if the site leaves active play.
